DG ISPR Lt Gen Ahmed Sharif‚Äôs Exclusive Interview with RT Arabic

Tensions with India must be viewed in context. India is backing terrorism in Pakistan and hiding behind false narratives. 

Within minutes of the Pahalgam incident, Indian media blamed Pakistan without evidence. 

Later, India‚Äôs own spokesperson admitted investigations were ongoing.

Pakistan offered cooperation via a neutral body if India had proof, but India rejected this and attacked Pakistani mosques, killing civilians. 

India supports terrorism in Pakistan, from TTP to Baloch groups.

Pakistan Armed Forces are bound to protect sovereignty‚Äîand did so, fully and decisively. 

On May 6‚Äì7, India fired missiles targeting civilians; Pakistan downed 6 jets. 

On May 9‚Äì10, India launched more attacks. On May 10, Pakistan responded with precision, targeting only military sites, avoiding civilians‚Äîa balanced and responsible reply.

#India then requested a ceasefire. #Pakistan, seeking peace and stability, agreed.

Pakistan‚Äôs diplomacy played a key global role. We are a peaceful, serious nation. Our priority is always peace. Even major powers like the U.S. understand the spirit of the Pakistani people.

#Pakistan #India #Trump #Modi
